name: TextPath

properties.name: centerBracket
properties.description: The halfway point between the start bracket and the end bracket.

properties.name: parentStory
properties.description: The story that contains the text.

properties.name: startTextFrame
properties.description: The first text frame in the thread. Can return: TextFrame or TextPath.

properties.name: endTextFrame
properties.description: The last text frame in the thread. Can return: TextFrame or TextPath.

properties.name: textFrameIndex
properties.description: The index of the text frame within the story.

properties.name: overflows
properties.description: If true, the story has overset text.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the TextPath.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the TextPath (a SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, TextFrame or EPSText).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the TextPath within its containing object.

properties.name: texts
properties.description: A collection of text objects.

properties.name: characters
properties.description: A collection of characters.

properties.name: words
properties.description: A collection of words.

properties.name: lines
properties.description: A collection of lines.

properties.name: textColumns
properties.description: A collection of text columns.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: A collection of paragraphs.

properties.name: insertionPoints
properties.description: A collection of insertion points.

properties.name: textStyleRanges
properties.description: A collection of text style ranges.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: pathAlignment
properties.description: The alignment of the type on a path.

properties.name: textAlignment
properties.description: The alignment applied to the type on a path.

properties.name: pathEffect
properties.description: The effect applied to the type on a path.

properties.name: flipPathEffect
properties.description: The flip effect applied to the type on a path.

properties.name: pathSpacing
properties.description: The spacing applied to the type on a path.

properties.name: startBracket
properties.description: The location of the start of the type on the path, expressed in points. Note: 0 is the first point on the path.

properties.name: endBracket
properties.description: The end of the type on a path. Note: Additional text becomes overset text unless the text is linked to another path or text frame.

properties.name: previousTextFrame
properties.description: The previous text frame in the thread. Can return: TextFrame or TextPath. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: nextTextFrame
properties.description: The next text frame in the thread. Can return: TextFrame or TextPath. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: contents
properties.description: The contents of the text frame. Can return: String, TextFrameContents enumerator or SpecialCharacters enumerator.

properties.name: label
properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the TextPath; this is an alias to the TextPath's label property.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: findText
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: changeText
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: findGrep
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: changeGrep
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: findGlyph
methods.description: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: changeGlyph
methods.description: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: findTransliterate
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: changeTransliterate
methods.description: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.description: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

methods.name: insertLabel
methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: extractLabel
methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextPath.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

properties.description: Dispatched before a TextPath is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_PLACE

properties.description: Dispatched after a TextPath is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_PLACE

description: A text object that is on a path.
